doc.title: Instrument of God
doc.plot: A devout Christian, young John Brown becomes a stationmaster on the Underground Railroad after witnessing the gruesome mutilation of a young black slave boy. He is later plagued by visions of apocalyptic violence in which he is god's chosen instrument for the destruction of slavery in the United States. Convinced of his "ordained destiny," John Brown wages a "Holy War" against slavery culminating in an attack on the United States government it self.
